Package dev.kkorolyov.pancake.core.component

Class Input.Handler

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.kkorolyov.pancake.core.component.Input.Handler
  • Enclosing class:
    Input
    public static class Input.Handler
extends java.lang.Object
    Wraps a MultiStageAction and uses collections of input enums to arm it.

        public Handler​(dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.action.MultiStageAction action,
               java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Enum<?>> inputs)
        Constructs a new key action.
        Parameters:
        action - wrapped multi-stage action
        inputs - keys and buttons tied to delegate; when all pressed, counts as an activation, else counts as a deactivation

      • arm

        public dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.action.Action arm​(java.util.Collection<java.lang.Enum<?>> inputs,
                                                        long dt)
        Arms the wrapped action after translating the intersection of expected inputs and given inputs into a MultiStageAction.ArmingOption.
        Parameters:
        inputs - current inputs
        dt - ns elapsed since the last invocation of this method
        Returns:
        armed wrapped action
